sentence: Wild is likely facing a rematch with Lisa Scheller, a businesswoman and former Lehigh County Commissioner who lost in 2020 by 4 percentage points.
author:
Kate Ackley
Mary Ellen McIntire
title: These 3 House members' reelection bids could end Tuesday

sentence: Their likely GOP challengers, Lisa Scheller in the 7th District and Jim Bognet in the 8th District, both have endorsements from Trump and McCarthy.
author: Aaron Navarro
title: House primaries to watch Tuesday: Madison Cawthorn faces several challengers and more
